item.title: Trump Is Not Different
item.description: Trump should not be judged differently than everyone who came before him.

item.title: The Supreme Court Should Reset the Debate on Immigration Enforcement
item.description: Trump must honor due process in his deportation push, but judges don’t get to make up their own requirements either.

item.title: Public Schools Robbed Children of Learning and Earnings. They Should Pay Kids Back
item.description: A national effort to compensate Americans affected by prolonged pandemic-era public school closures and other education policy failures is long overdu...

item.title: Amy Sherald at the Whitney: Far More Than Michelle Obama’s Portrait
item.description: She’s a talented artist, but she needs to avoid rich, white, liberal groupthink, since it’ll ruin her work.

item.title: Bring On Golden Dome
item.description: President Trump set out the correct vision on missile defense, but it will require follow-up.
